t: Trust in the Salvation of the Lord
To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David.
How*pn long, O Lord?*s Will You forget me forever? How*ld long will You hide Your face from me?
How*ld long shall I take counsel in my soul, Having*ild sorrow in my heart daily? How*ld long will my enemy be exalted over me?
Consider*ln and*i hear me, O Lord*s my God; Enlighten*ld my eyes, Lest*ld I sleep the sleep*i of*i death;
Lest*ld my enemy say, “I*ld have prevailed against him”; Lest*ild those who trouble me rejoice when I am moved.
But*ln I have trusted in Your mercy; My*ld heart shall rejoice in Your salvation.
I*ld will sing to the Lord,*s Because*ld He has dealt bountifully with me.
